definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: For an instant I was relieved, nobody had raised any objection.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人提出反對意見，我心裏暫時鬆快了一些。

sentences.english: There isn't much space left in the room.
During this special period, the buses are uncrowded .
sentences.chinese: 在這個特殊時期，汽車上很鬆快。
